objective.description: String specifying the objective/type of optimization.

emission_limit.description: emission limit to be enforced if objective function is costs_emissionlimit

N.description: Number of Monte Carlo simulations (0 = off).

type.description: Type of Monte Carlo simulation. For type 1 the user defines the standard deviation and the components to vary. For type 2 the user provides a csv file with the parameters and their min, max and reference values.

sd.description: Value defining the range in which variables are varied in Monte Carlo simulations (defined as the standard deviation of the original value).

timestaging.description: Defines number of timesteps that are averaged (0 = off).

N.description: Determines number of typical days (0 = off).

method.description: Determine method used for modeling technologies with typical days.

technologies_with_full_res.description: If method 2 is chosen, list determines which technologies are modelled at full resolution. Should be at least all storage technologies.

multiyear.description: Enable multiyear analysis, if turned off max time horizon is 1 year.

timelim.description: Value to define time limit in hours.

threads.description: Value to define number of threads (default is maximum available).

nodefilestart.description: Parameter to decide when nodes are compressed and written to disk.

method.description: Defines algorithm used to solve continuous models.

heuristics.description: Parameter to determine amount of time spent in MIP heuristics.

branchdir.description: Determines which child node is explored first in the branch-and-cut.

lpwarmstart.description: Controls whether and how warm start information is used for LP.

intfeastol.description: Value that determines the integer feasibility tolerance.

feastol.description: Value that determines feasibility for all constraints.

numericfocus.description: Degree of which Gurobi tries to detect and manage numeric issues.

cuts.description: Setting defining the aggressiveness of the global cut.

save_detailed.description: Setting to select how the results are saved. When turned off only the summary is saved.

save_summary_path.description: Path to save the summary file path to.

save_path.description: Option to define the save path.

case_name.description: Option to define a case study name that is added to the results folder name.

write_solution_diagnostics.description: If 1, writes solution quality, if 2 also writes pyomo to Gurobi variable map and constraint map to file.

violation.description: Determines the energy balance violation price (-1 is no violation allowed).

copperplate.description: Determines if a copperplate approach is used.

global_discountrate.description: Determines if and which global discount rate is used. This holds for the CAPEX of all technologies and networks.

global_simple_capex_model.description: Determines if the CAPEX model of technologies is set to 1 for all technologies.

scaling_on.description: Determines if the model is scaled. If 1, it uses global and component specific scaling factors.

energy_vars.description: Scaling factor used for all energy variables.

cost_vars.description: Scaling factor used for all cost variables.

objective.description: Scaling factor used for the objective function.
